HERO.SUBTITLE: Turn experience into opportunity
HERO.TITLE:
Rewrite your career story
 with Reshume

STATISTICS.TITLE: Helping professionals unlock new career opportunities
STATISTICS.DESCRIPTION: Thousands of professionals have increased their job opportunities by making their resumes stand out from the rest

ATS_OPTIMIZED.HEAD: Readable by recruiters and systems
ATS_OPTIMIZED.TITLE: ATS-Optimized Structure
ATS_OPTIMIZED.DESCRIPTION: Resumes built using proven, <bold>ATS-safe layouts that hiring systems</bold> can read accurately. We avoid tables, columns, icons, and hidden formatting to ensure your experience is parsed exactly as recruiters expect no lost information, no broken sections.

1.TITLE: Smart Section Parsing
1.DESCRIPTION: Sections like Experience, Education, and Skills follow standardized naming and structure, helping ATS systems correctly categorize and rank your resume content.

2.TITLE: Clean Content Hierarchy
2.DESCRIPTION: Clear headings, consistent spacing, and logical content flow ensure both automated systems and human recruiters can scan your resume effortlessly.

INSTANT_RESUME_GENERATION.HEAD: From empty to ready in seconds
INSTANT_RESUME_GENERATION.TITLE: Instant Generation
INSTANT_RESUME_GENERATION.DESCRIPTION: Create a professional resume in minutes by simply filling in your information. Reshume <bold>handles layout, spacing, and structure automatically</bold> so you can focus on your experience, not formatting or design decisions.

PROFESSIONAL_TEMPLATES.HEAD: Designed to look serious and professional
PROFESSIONAL_TEMPLATES.TITLE: Professional Templates
PROFESSIONAL_TEMPLATES.SUBTITLE: Choose a template that fits your career stage, not just your style.
PROFESSIONAL_TEMPLATES.DESCRIPTION: Reshume offers professionally designed resume templates based on real hiring standards. <bold>Clean layouts, balanced typography, and structured sections</bold> built to highlight your experience without distractions.

CLASSIC.NAME: Classic
CLASSIC.DESCRIPTION: A traditional, well-structured layout inspired by academic and corporate resumes. Ideal for conservative industries, junior to mid-level roles, and applications where clarity matters most.

MODERN.NAME: Modern
MODERN.DESCRIPTION: A contemporary layout with subtle visual hierarchy and improved readability designed for tech, product, and creative professionals who want a modern but professional look.

EXECUTIVE.NAME: Executive
EXECUTIVE.DESCRIPTION: A refined, high-impact layout designed for leadership positions, focusing on strategic achievements and executive presence.

IMPACT.NAME: Impact
IMPACT.DESCRIPTION: A bold, results-oriented template that highlights measurable achievements, metrics, and business impact.

PRICING.TITLE: No need to pay for a resume builder
PRICING.DESCRIPTION: Reshume is currently free while in early development, you can generate a professional resume. Future premium features will always remain optional.

STANDARD.HEADLINE: Everything you need to generate a professional resume.
STANDARD.DESCRIPTION: Perfect for job seekers and professionals looking for a professional resume.

PREMIUM.HEADLINE: Advanced templates and features for specialized roles.
PREMIUM.DESCRIPTION: Designed for executives, managers, and high-performance roles.

LOADING_SCREEN.PLEASE_WAIT: Please wait while we generate your resume

SKILLS.TITLE: Skills

CATEGORIES.PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGES_DESCRIPTION: Programming languages are the foundation of modern software development. They are used to create the logic and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.FRAMEWORKS_DESCRIPTION: Frameworks are libraries that provide a foundation for building applications. They are used to create the structure and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.DATABASES_DESCRIPTION: Databases are used to store and manage data. They are used to create the structure and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.TOOLS_DESCRIPTION: Tools are used to create the structure and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.DEVOPS_DESCRIPTION: DevOps is the practice of combining software development and IT operations. It is used to create the structure and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.DESIGN_DESCRIPTION: Design is the practice of creating the visual and aesthetic elements of applications. It is used to create the structure and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.LANGUAGES_DESCRIPTION: Languages are used to create the logic and functionality of applications. They are used to create the structure and functionality of applications.
CATEGORIES.OTHER_DESCRIPTION: Other is used to create the structure and functionality of applications.

SKILLS.NO_SKILLS_ADDED: No skills added. Click 'Add Skill' to start.

FIELDS.LANGUAGE_LABEL: Select the language of your resume
FIELDS.LANGUAGE_DESCRIPTION: The language of your resume will be used to generate the resume in the selected language, both the titles of the sections and the dates of your studies and experiences will be translated.
FIELDS.TEMPLATE_DESCRIPTION: The resume template will be used to generate the resume in the selected template. You can select the template that you like the most.
FIELDS.YES_DESCRIPTION: Icons are used to improve the visualization of your resume. They are used in the social media section.
FIELDS.NO_DESCRIPTION: No icons will be displayed in your resume. Only your social media links will be displayed.
FIELDS.CLEAR_FIELDS_AFTER_GENERATION: Do you want to clear the fields after generating the resume?

ERRORS.INVALID_NUMBER: Phone number must start with '+' and contain only numbers, spaces, and hyphens
ERRORS.INVALID_OPTION: The selected option is not valid

CLASSIC.DESCRIPTION: A clean, recruiter-approved format optimized for ATS and traditional hiring processes.

MODERN.NAME: Modern
MODERN.DESCRIPTION: A modern layout that balances visual clarity with full ATS compatibility.

EXECUTIVE.NAME: Executive
EXECUTIVE.DESCRIPTION: Ideal for managers, leads, and executives who need to communicate impact, leadership, and results â€” while staying fully ATS-compliant.

IMPACT.NAME: Impact
IMPACT.DESCRIPTION: Built for professionals who want to stand out by showcasing real impact using data, KPIs, and quantified results.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Page not found
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The page you are looking for does not exist or is currently in development.
